item.title: Prometheus Pulls/Pushes Metrics from/to Another Prometheus
item.description: Requirement I have 3 Prometheus servers and want to consolidate all of them into 1 Grafana. And one VM (Server C) is in a restricted zone and this zone only permits a special firewall rule from this zone to other zones. Prometheus A pulls (receive) metrics from Prometheus B In this scenario, we use the Federation feature to pull metrics from another Prometheus. You don't need to do any changes in Prometheus B, just add a new job in prometheus.
